slug.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a small creature with a soft body, that moves very slowly and eats garden plants
slug.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: Perez still has a slug lodged in his left shoulder.
slug.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a small amount of a strong alcoholic drink
slug.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: a piece of metal shaped like a coin, used to illegally get a drink, ticket etc from a machine
slug.translation[0].definitions[4].defin: someone who gets to work by standing in a particular place until a driver stops and lets them go with them in their car
slug.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to hit someone hard with your closed hand
slug.translation[1].definitions[2].defin: to drink an alcoholic drink, especially by swallowing large amounts at the same time
